## ConnectionDB.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `ConnectionDB` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(checker: IConnectionChecker);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  checker | IConnectionChecker | The workspace's connection type checker, used to decide if connections are valid during a drag. |
